tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "40184C9B40B8470D9E71B388BEBD62BD", "You\'ve entered your first node! Each node is a seed of great potential, a settlement that can grow into a mighty metropolis.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "B32C109E48ECBB7FF79D0BA3DA36B0BB", "Once a node has begun to grow, it offers services to those working to tame its wilds and help its settlers.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "A8236B444F72ACAABD98048E05935AB9", "Your actions can help a node grow into a city where you can put down roots and become a citizen. Citizens can play a more active role in deciding how a node will develop.")
